tests.code:
const tokenId = await (0, util_1.mintBySpg)(nftContract, "test-metadata");
const result = await client.ipAsset.registerIpAndAttachPilTerms({
    nftContract: nftContract,
    tokenId,
    licenseTermsData: [
        {
            terms: {
                transferable: true,
                royaltyPolicy: viem_1.zeroAddress,
                defaultMintingFee: 0n,
                expiration: 0n,
                commercialUse: false,
                commercialAttribution: false,
                commercializerChecker: viem_1.zeroAddress,
                commercializerCheckerData: viem_1.zeroAddress,
                commercialRevShare: 0,
                commercialRevCeiling: 0n,
                derivativesAllowed: true,
                derivativesAttribution: true,
                derivativesApproval: false,
                derivativesReciprocal: true,
                derivativeRevCeiling: 0n,
                currency: common_1.WIP_TOKEN_ADDRESS,
                uri: "",
            },
            licensingConfig: {
                isSet: true,
                mintingFee: 0n,
                licensingHook: viem_1.zeroAddress,
                hookData: viem_1.zeroAddress,
                commercialRevShare: 0,
                disabled: false,
                expectMinimumGroupRewardShare: 0,
                expectGroupRewardPool: viem_1.zeroAddress,
            },
            maxLicenseTokens: 100,
        },
        {
            terms: {
                transferable: true,
                royaltyPolicy: generated_1.royaltyPolicyLapAddress[util_1.aeneid],
                defaultMintingFee: 10000n,
                expiration: 1000n,
                commercialUse: true,
                commercialAttribution: false,
                commercializerChecker: viem_1.zeroAddress,
                commercializerCheckerData: viem_1.zeroAddress,
                commercialRevShare: 0,
                commercialRevCeiling: 0n,
                derivativesAllowed: true,
                derivativesAttribution: true,
                derivativesApproval: false,
                derivativesReciprocal: true,
                derivativeRevCeiling: 0n,
                currency: common_1.WIP_TOKEN_ADDRESS,
                uri: "test case",
            },
            licensingConfig: {
                isSet: true,
                mintingFee: 10000n,
                licensingHook: viem_1.zeroAddress,
                hookData: viem_1.zeroAddress,
                commercialRevShare: 0,
                disabled: false,
                expectMinimumGroupRewardShare: 0,
                expectGroupRewardPool: viem_1.zeroAddress,
            },
        },
    ],
});
(0, chai_1.expect)(result.txHash).to.be.a("string");
(0, chai_1.expect)(result.ipId).to.be.a("string");
(0, chai_1.expect)(result.licenseTermsIds).to.be.an("array");
(0, chai_1.expect)(result.maxLicenseTokensTxHashes).to.be.an("array");
(0, chai_1.expect)(result.maxLicenseTokensTxHashes?.length).to.be.equal(1);

tests.code:
const tokenId = await (0, util_1.mintBySpg)(nftContract, "test-metadata");
const result = await client.ipAsset.registerIPAndAttachLicenseTermsAndDistributeRoyaltyTokens({
    nftContract: nftContract,
    tokenId,
    licenseTermsData: [
        {
            terms: {
                transferable: true,
                royaltyPolicy: generated_1.royaltyPolicyLapAddress[util_1.aeneid],
                defaultMintingFee: 0n,
                expiration: 1000n,
                commercialUse: true,
                commercialAttribution: false,
                commercializerChecker: viem_1.zeroAddress,
                commercializerCheckerData: viem_1.zeroAddress,
                commercialRevShare: 0,
                commercialRevCeiling: 0n,
                derivativesAllowed: true,
                derivativesAttribution: true,
                derivativesApproval: false,
                derivativesReciprocal: true,
                derivativeRevCeiling: 0n,
                currency: common_1.WIP_TOKEN_ADDRESS,
                uri: "test case",
            },
            licensingConfig: {
                isSet: true,
                mintingFee: 1n,
                licensingHook: viem_1.zeroAddress,
                hookData: viem_1.zeroAddress,
                commercialRevShare: 0,
                disabled: false,
                expectMinimumGroupRewardShare: 0,
                expectGroupRewardPool: viem_1.zeroAddress,
            },
            maxLicenseTokens: 100,
        },
        {
            terms: {
                transferable: true,
                royaltyPolicy: generated_1.royaltyPolicyLapAddress[util_1.aeneid],
                defaultMintingFee: 0n,
                expiration: 1000n,
                commercialUse: true,
                commercialAttribution: false,
                commercializerChecker: viem_1.zeroAddress,
                commercializerCheckerData: viem_1.zeroAddress,
                commercialRevShare: 0,
                commercialRevCeiling: 0n,
                derivativesAllowed: true,
                derivativesAttribution: true,
                derivativesApproval: false,
                derivativesReciprocal: true,
                derivativeRevCeiling: 0n,
                currency: common_1.WIP_TOKEN_ADDRESS,
                uri: "test case",
            },
            licensingConfig: {
                isSet: true,
                mintingFee: 1n,
                licensingHook: viem_1.zeroAddress,
                hookData: viem_1.zeroAddress,
                commercialRevShare: 0,
                disabled: false,
                expectMinimumGroupRewardShare: 0,
                expectGroupRewardPool: viem_1.zeroAddress,
            },
            maxLicenseTokens: 100,
        },
        {
            terms: {
                transferable: true,
                royaltyPolicy: generated_1.royaltyPolicyLapAddress[util_1.aeneid],
                defaultMintingFee: 0n,
                expiration: 1000n,
                commercialUse: true,
                commercialAttribution: false,
                commercializerChecker: viem_1.zeroAddress,
                commercializerCheckerData: viem_1.zeroAddress,
                commercialRevShare: 0,
                commercialRevCeiling: 0n,
                derivativesAllowed: true,
                derivativesAttribution: true,
                derivativesApproval: false,
                derivativesReciprocal: true,
                derivativeRevCeiling: 0n,
                currency: common_1.WIP_TOKEN_ADDRESS,
                uri: "test case",
            },
            licensingConfig: {
                isSet: true,
                mintingFee: 1n,
                licensingHook: viem_1.zeroAddress,
                hookData: viem_1.zeroAddress,
                commercialRevShare: 0,
                disabled: false,
                expectMinimumGroupRewardShare: 0,
                expectGroupRewardPool: viem_1.zeroAddress,
            },
        },
    ],
    ipMetadata: {
        ipMetadataURI: "test-uri",
        ipMetadataHash: (0, viem_1.toHex)("test-metadata-hash", { size: 32 }),
        nftMetadataHash: (0, viem_1.toHex)("test-nft-metadata-hash", { size: 32 }),
    },
    royaltyShares: [
        {
            recipient: util_1.TEST_WALLET_ADDRESS,
            percentage: 1,
        },
    ],
});
(0, chai_1.expect)(result.registerIpAndAttachPilTermsAndDeployRoyaltyVaultTxHash).to.be.a("string");
(0, chai_1.expect)(result.distributeRoyaltyTokensTxHash).to.be.a("string");
(0, chai_1.expect)(result.ipId).to.be.a("string");
(0, chai_1.expect)(result.licenseTermsIds).to.be.an("array");
(0, chai_1.expect)(result.maxLicenseTokensTxHashes).to.be.an("array");
(0, chai_1.expect)(result.maxLicenseTokensTxHashes?.length).to.be.equal(2);

const result = await client.ipAsset.mintAndRegisterIpAssetWithPilTerms({
    spgNftContract: spgNftContractWithPrivateMinting,
    allowDuplicates: false,
    licenseTermsData: [
        {
            terms: {
                transferable: true,
                royaltyPolicy: generated_1.royaltyPolicyLapAddress[util_1.aeneid],
                defaultMintingFee: 6n,
                expiration: 0n,
                commercialUse: true,
                commercialAttribution: false,
                commercializerChecker: viem_1.zeroAddress,
                commercializerCheckerData: viem_1.zeroAddress,
                commercialRevShare: 90,
                commercialRevCeiling: 0n,
                derivativesAllowed: true,
                derivativesAttribution: true,
                derivativesApproval: false,
                derivativesReciprocal: true,
                derivativeRevCeiling: 0n,
                currency: common_1.WIP_TOKEN_ADDRESS,
                uri: "",
            },
            licensingConfig: {
                isSet: true,
                mintingFee: 6n,
                licensingHook: viem_1.zeroAddress,
                hookData: viem_1.zeroAddress,
                commercialRevShare: 0,
                disabled: false,
                expectMinimumGroupRewardShare: 0,
                expectGroupRewardPool: pool,
            },
            maxLicenseTokens: 100,
        },
        {
            terms: {
                transferable: true,
                royaltyPolicy: generated_1.royaltyPolicyLapAddress[util_1.aeneid],
                defaultMintingFee: 5n,
                expiration: 0n,
                commercialUse: true,
                commercialAttribution: false,

                commercializerCheckerData: viem_1.zeroAddress,

                commercialRevCeiling: 0n,
                derivativesAllowed: true,
                derivativesAttribution: true,
                derivativesApproval: false,
                derivativesReciprocal: true,
                derivativeRevCeiling: 0n,
                currency: common_1.WIP_TOKEN_ADDRESS,
                uri: "",
            },
            licensingConfig: {
                isSet: true,
                mintingFee: 6n,
                licensingHook: viem_1.zeroAddress,
                hookData: viem_1.zeroAddress,
                commercialRevShare: 0,
                disabled: false,
                expectMinimumGroupRewardShare: 0,
                expectGroupRewardPool: pool,
            },
            maxLicenseTokens: 100,
        },
        {
            terms: {
                transferable: true,
                royaltyPolicy: generated_1.royaltyPolicyLapAddress[util_1.aeneid],
                defaultMintingFee: 5n,
                expiration: 0n,
                commercialUse: true,
                commercialAttribution: false,
                commercializerChecker: viem_1.zeroAddress,
                commercializerCheckerData: viem_1.zeroAddress,
                commercialRevShare: 90,
                commercialRevCeiling: 0n,
                derivativesAllowed: true,
                derivativesAttribution: true,
                derivativesApproval: false,
                derivativesReciprocal: true,
                derivativeRevCeiling: 0n,
                currency: common_1.WIP_TOKEN_ADDRESS,
                uri: "",
            },
            licensingConfig: {
                isSet: true,
                mintingFee: 6n,
                licensingHook: viem_1.zeroAddress,
                hookData: viem_1.zeroAddress,
                commercialRevShare: 0,
                disabled: false,
                expectMinimumGroupRewardShare: 0,
                expectGroupRewardPool: pool,
            },
        },
    ],
    ipMetadata: {
        nftMetadataHash: (0, viem_1.toHex)("test-nft-metadata-hash", { size: 32 }),
    },
});
(0, chai_1.expect)(result.txHash).to.be.a("string");
(0, chai_1.expect)(result.maxLicenseTokensTxHashes).to.be.an("array");
(0, chai_1.expect)(result.maxLicenseTokensTxHashes?.length).to.be.equal(2);
